verses.name: Deuteronomy 11:22
verses.text: For if ye shall diligently keep all these commandments which I command you, to do them, to love the Lord your God, to walk in all his ways, and to cleave unto him;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 11:23
verses.text: Then will the Lord drive out all these nations from before you, and ye shall possess greater nations and mightier than yourselves.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 11:24
verses.text: Every place whereon the soles of your feet shall tread shall be yours: from the wilderness and Lebanon, from the river, the river Euphrates, even unto the uttermost sea shall your coast be.
